title: Davide Rossetti
text:
Email
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  

  
  


I am a dynamic entrepreneur in the textile industry, a sports enthusiast, and a passionate music lover. With 25 years of experience in the production of technical fabrics for industrial applications, aquaculture, and agriculture, I have built a strong network of relationships that connect clients and partners in Italy and Europe. I see challenges as opportunities for personal and professional growth.
Learn more about my experience through past projects and partnerships at this page
I am open to collaborating on new ventures in managerial or commercial roles within my field of expertise.

title: Il network industriale
text:
Azienda manifatturiera di reti e tessuti tecnici
www.rossettinet.com | “We follow the net”  Protagonisti nel proporre la rete come risposta/soluzione a ogni esigenza di contenimento, raccolta, separazione, movimentazione, protezione, design, rintracciabile nell’uso quotidiano e nei processi industriali










  


Fabbricazione di tubolari in rete e tessuti tecnici
www.taisnet.com | “Net passion” Tubolari in rete e tessuti tecnici prodotti con la tecnologia della “maglieria in catena” (Raschel).  Applicazioni  Industriali  Speciali
